we will be sad to see you go, if we can do anything to change your mind please

This will delete your account from our platform and all of your data will be permanently erased. If you still have funds in your walled or unattended sessions please ensure to use them before proceeding. We will not be able to provide any refunds for unused funds or unattended sessions
